report.title: My Sites Lookup
report.description: A list of sites I've created, or added to my list of sites (a custom person attribute). No site summary information returned.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l LEFT JOIN locations_websites lw ON lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false LEFT JOIN (person_attribute_values pav JOIN users u ON u.person_id=pav.person_id AND u.id=#user_id# ) ON pav.person_attribute_id=#person_site_attr_id# AND pav.int_value=l.id AND pav.deleted=false LEFT JOIN (groups_locations gl JOIN groups g on g.id=gl.group_id and g.deleted=false JOIN groups_users gu on gu.group_id=g.id and gu.user_id=#user_id# and gu.pending=false and gu.deleted=false ) on gl.location_id=l.id and gl.deleted=false #joins# WHERE l.deleted=false AND #website_filter# AND ( -- include sites the user created l.created_by_id=#user_id# -- include sites explicitly linked to the user OR u.id IS NOT NULL -- include group sites if we are working within a specific group OR gl.group_id=#group_id# -- include group sites if group not specified but group's don't need to be explicitly posted into the group OR (#group_id#=0 and g.implicit_record_inclusion=true) )

param.name: group_id
param.description: The recording group we are looking up sites for

param.name: person_site_attr_id
param.description: The person attribute ID used to store My Sites

column.name: created_by_user
column.sql: CASE l.created_by_id WHEN #user_id# THEN true ELSE false END

column.name: linked_to_user
column.sql: CASE WHEN pav.id IS NOT NULL THEN true ELSE false END
